Header: Oddusudan Sivam Kovil Premises Receives Thorough Clean-up
Content: Troops of the 64 Division under command to the Security Force Headquarters - Mullaittivu (SFHQ-MLT) launched a self-help, 'Sharmadana' project on Thursday (10) at Oddusudan Sivam Kovil premises as the sacred premises was found littered with garbage and dried leaves. Brigadier Jayanath Jayaweera, General Officer Commanding, 64 Division supervised the project, attended by a few more than 150 troops.  A large crowd of civilians and devotees also cooperated with the troops for this cleaning work.
